entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to rain or drizzle this evening and ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023
